text: Anderson Silva da Paixão (born 5 March 1998), simply known as Anderson, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Athletico Paranaense. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Palmeiras |2019 |Série A |0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- |Santa Cruz (loan) |2019 |Série C |18||0||7||0||6||0||colspan="2"|—||5Appearances in the Copa do Nordeste||0||36||0 |- |rowspan="3"|Athletico Paranaense |2019 |rowspan="2"|Série A |0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- |2020 |0||0||5||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||5||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !0!!0!!5!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!5!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !18!!0!!12!!0!!6!!0!!0!!0!!5!!0!!41!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras players Category:Centro Sportivo Alagoano players Category:Santa Cruz Futebol Clube players Category:Club Athletico Paranaense players Category:Brazil youth international footballers
